From Ashes crashes with this reloaded update (if it in fact is a reloaded release)

It's the console bug on eden prime. you access one of the two consoles, and the game crashes. very repeatable bug, tried with different classes, characters, squadmate, different time in plots, all of them crashes the game.

and the workaround from before the 1.04 update no longer work -- the esc button smashing trick and the go-to-the-other-console-first trick don't work anymore.
